title: ADC Main looking for Duo
body:
Bounced around silver/gold most of last season looking for silver/high bronze support main preferably. 
TIme zone: PST (Can play whenever most days)
Age; 21
IGN: Mezzie

Comment below and add me in game if you are interested.

replies.body: I was gold last season, we can play some games if you like.
Faust Lord, hit me up :) Bronze 1 last season, however I got placed bronze 3 this season, getting 27+ lp per win
